alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 10:03PM CDT until July 13 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Chickasaw County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1002 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Hampton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fredericksburg around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads B 54 And V 56, Twin Ponds Park, Boyd, Williamstown, Highway 18 And County V 56, Highway 63 And County B 33 and New Hampton Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
